meanings.definition: Arguing about a subject, especially in a formal manner.
meanings.sent1: The debating at the school competition was intense.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching debating tournaments on TV.
meanings.sent3: The debating between the two teams was so serious that they forgot to eat lunch.
meanings.sent4: The debating in the courtroom resembled a battle of wits.
meanings.sent5: The heated debating left everyone in the audience on the edge of their seats.

meanings.definition: Engaging in a discussion or argument.
meanings.sent1: She was debating with her friend about which movie to watch.
meanings.sent2: Politicians often spend hours debating important issues.
meanings.sent3: The siblings were debating over who should do the dishes.
meanings.sent4: The team members were debating fiercely to come up with the best strategy.
meanings.sent5: Students were debating excitedly about the upcoming school event.

meanings.sent1: The debating group welcomed all opinions during their meeting.

meanings.sent3: The debating attitude of the team made decision-making challenging.
